source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_SEQ_00<tab>Krile and G'raha Tia were having a pleasant conversation until you barged in.
target: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_SEQ_00<tab>バルデシオン分館のクルルは、グ・ラハ・ティアと何か話していたようだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_SEQ_01<tab>Following your late-night feast with the junior Scions, you awake to find Krile and G'raha engaged in idle banter. During your adventures in Thavnair, Scholarch Montichaigne had stopped by the annex for a friendly chat, only to find you absent. Krile invites you to join her in visiting her former schoolmaster, that you may express your gratitude for his kind words in the Rostra.
target: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_SEQ_01<tab>クルルとともに、魔法大学に行くことになった。バルデシオン分館前の「アリゼー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_SEQ_02<tab>As alumni of the Studium, Alisaie and Alphinaud jump at the chance to accompany you to their old stamping ground, though there is some concern that recent events will cast a pall over what would otherwise be a jubilant return.
target: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_SEQ_02<tab>アリゼーとアルフィノも一緒に行くことになった。オールド・シャーレアンのフェノメノン大講堂前にいる「クルル」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_SEQ_03<tab>You meet with Krile and the twins outside the entrance of Phenomenon, which as Alphinaud zealously explains, is the very heart of the Studium. Alisaie also recalls with some chagrin her brother's astonishing achievements and fearsome reputation during his days as a student, until Krile turns the conversation to more immediate matters. She points out that Scholarch Montichaigne is a notoriously difficult man to track down, and the surest way to find him is to question the young scholars in the vicinity.
target: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_SEQ_03<tab>アルフィノ伝説の巣窟、フェノメノン大講堂に入ることになった。フェノメノン大講堂の「興奮した魔法大学生」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_SEQ_04<tab>As Alphinaud finds himself mobbed with fervent admirers, you narrow your search to students more amenable to calm conversation. One helpful young man points you in the direction of a “Miss Aliapoh,” a name with a strangely familiar ring to it.
target: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_SEQ_04<tab>興奮した魔法大学生は、モンティシェーニュの居場所を知らなかった。フェノメノン大講堂の選者殿にいる「キィ・アリアポー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_SEQ_05<tab>Qih Aliapoh, overseer of proceedings at Searchers' Meet, eventually provides you with useful information, but not before a lengthy and unsolicited explanation of the facility, due in no small part to mistaking you for a gleaner. Having spent more than enough time humoring the hopeless helper, you make your way to Makers' Meet, as she advised.
target: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_SEQ_05<tab>キィ・アリアポーから工匠殿に行くことを勧められた。フェノメノン大講堂の工匠殿にいる「冷静そうな魔法大学生」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_SEQ_06<tab>You arrive in the laboratory to discover a noticeable lack of scholarchs. Thankfully, a nearby student reveals he had spoken to Montichaigne but a few moments ago, and you follow your latest lead down the corridor.
target: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_SEQ_06<tab>冷静そうな魔法大学生によれば、モンティシェーニュは講堂のどれかにいるらしい。フェノメノン大講堂で「モンティシェーニュ」を探そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_SEQ_07<tab>Montichaigne has unwittingly sent you on a merry chase, but any frustration accumulated over the arduous search soon dissolves as he greets you with a warm smile. Lighthearted chatter then gives way to graver matters, and he reveals that an enchantment has been placed upon all Forum members to prevent them from revealing the truth of their great duty. Unable to speak further on the subject, he instead gives an impromptu lecture on the relationship between memories and the soul, and though its relevance is not yet apparent, you take his words to heart nonetheless. Satisfied that he has imparted to you sufficient food for thought, Montichaigne concludes the lesson and bids you farewell.
target: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_SEQ_07<tab>モンティシェーニュを見つけ、講義をしてもらった。強いエーテルを浴びせることで、記憶を封じたり、それにまつわる行動を制限したりする術があるらしい。今後のために、念頭に置いておこう。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Alisaie.
target: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_TODO_00<tab>アリゼーと話す

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Krile.
target: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_TODO_01<tab>クルルと話す

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the excitable student.
target: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_TODO_02<tab>興奮した魔法大学生と話す

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Miss Aliapoh.
target: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_TODO_03<tab>キィ・アリアポーと話す

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the level-headed student.
target: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_TODO_04<tab>冷静そうな魔法大学生と話す

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_TODO_05<tab>Search for Montichaigne.
target: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_TODO_05<tab>モンティシェーニュを探す

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_TODO_23<tab>
target: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_TODO_23<tab>

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_GRAHATIA_000_000<tab>I hope you didn't mind us barging into your room for our late-night feast. For what it's worth, it did me a world of good to put our troubles to one side, if only for a moment.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_GRAHATIA_000_000おはよう……でいいか？
昨日は部屋を貸してくれて、ありがとな！
あんな賑やかな夕飯、久々で楽しかったよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_010<tab>Oh, there you are! Feeling refreshed, I hope?
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_010あっ、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
押しかけておいてなんだけど、
あのあと、ゆっくり休めたかしら……？

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_011<tab>I was about to make my way to the Studium, as it happens.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_011それにしても、いいタイミングで出てきてくれたわ。
実は、今から「シャーレアン魔法大学」に行こうとしていたの。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_012<tab>I wanted to try and speak with Scholarch Montichaigne and thank him for coming to our rescue in the Rostra.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_012哲学者議会の査問会で、私たちを庇ってくださった、
モンティシェーニュ様のことを覚えてる？
魔法大学の学長も務めていらっしゃる、偉大な賢人よ。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_013<tab>As it turns out, he'd come here to see <var 1A 02 /var>us<var 1A 01 /var> following the hearing, only to find that we'd already departed for Thavnair. Knowing him, he was probably hoping to chew the cud with his former students.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_013私たちがサベネア島に行っている間に、
あの方が、分館を訪ねてきてくださったそうなの。
査問会のこともあったし、心配してくれたみたい。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_014<tab>Since we're still waiting for Y'shtola and the others, I thought now the perfect time to pay him a visit. Care to join me?
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_014だから、ヤ・シュトラたちから連絡がくる前に、
お礼を言いにいこうと思うの。
あなたも、よければ一緒に魔法大学へ行ってみない？

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_015<tab>Then it's settled! The twins will be coming too, assuming Alphinaud can tear himself away from his new toys. I'll let you rally the troops while I go on ahead to Phenomenon.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_015……決まりね！
外で訓練に励んでるアルフィノくんたちも連れて、
大書院の近くにある「フェノメノン大講堂」に行きましょう！

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_GRAHATIA_000_016<tab>Considering my recent impropriety, perhaps I should avoid showing my face around the Studium for a time...
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_GRAHATIA_000_016オレは、このまま分館で待機してる。
その方が、何か動きがあったときに、
素早く対応できるだろうからな。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_017<tab>That might be for the best. If the others should return, tell them we will not be long.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_017ラハくん、ありがとう！
ふらっと出かけていったエスティニアンさんが戻ったら、
せめて行き先は知らせておいて、って伝えてね！

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_GRAHATIA_000_020<tab>Unlike some of the Scions, I am not an alumni of the Studium. As such, I have no acquaintances there I am obliged to visit.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_GRAHATIA_000_020オレは魔法大学の学生じゃなかったから、
会いたい知人がいるわけでもない。
というわけで、今回は素直に留守番だ。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_GRAHATIA_000_021<tab>And while I would love nothing more than to pore over the many great tomes of Phenomenon, I fear my presence there would stir up more unwanted trouble...so! For now, I will be patient. Much as it pains me to do so.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_GRAHATIA_000_021まあ、かの有名な「フェノメノン大講堂」に、
どんな史料が収められてるかには興味がなくも……ないが、
そこは、その……ちゃんとわきまえてるからな！

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALPHINAUD_000_025<tab>If Father can master these fiendish contraptions, then so can I!
target: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALPHINAUD_000_025<tab>賢具を……もっと自在に……！

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_030<tab>Heading out for a stroll?
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_030あら……？
もしかして、どこかに出かけるの？

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_031<tab>The scholarch himself was here? In that case, what are we waiting for?
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_031へえ、魔法大学に……。
モンティシェーニュ様には私もお礼を言いたかったし、
もちろん行かせてもらうわ！

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALPHINAUD_000_032<tab>I too am eager to see him, though I somewhat dread the thought of visiting the Studium. I daresay our notoriety precedes us...
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALPHINAUD_000_032そうだね、私も同行させてもらおう。
今はあまり、学生たちにいい顔をされないかもしれないが……。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_033<tab>...Alphinaud of all people worrying over his reputation. And at our alma mater, no less! Will wonders never cease.
target: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_033<tab>……アルフィノなら、その心配は絶ッ対にいらないと思うわよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_034<tab>You'll understand soon enough. Off we go!
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_034とりあえず、行きましょ！
目指すは「フェノメノン大講堂」ね！

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALPHINAUD_000_040<tab>It feels like only yesterday that I first walked through these doors...
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALPHINAUD_000_040懐かしいな……。
この大講堂には、在学中、毎日のように通ったものだよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_045<tab>See that sculpted pitcher above the entrance? That's the mark of Thaliak, the Scholar. Bearer of the waters of knowledge. It's no exaggeration to say that Sharlayan itself is one enormous shrine to Him, and that's especially noticeable here in the Studium.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_045扉の上の方、水瓶の紋章が見えるでしょ？
あれはサリャク神の持つ、知恵の水瓶よ。
魔法大学の掲げる印でもあるの。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_050<tab>Here it is: Phenomenon. While I expect you made note of it before─one can hardly miss it─this is the first time you've been here on official business, correct?
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_050ここが「フェノメノン大講堂」……
シャーレアン魔法大学でもっとも歴史が古く、大きく、
格式高いとされている、中心的な建物よ。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_051<tab>While most of the space is taken up by the expansive auditoriums, it also houses numerous laboratories, testing grounds for experimental magicks, and a host of administrative offices and so forth.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_051講堂といっても、ただ講話を聴くだけの場所じゃないわ。
さまざまな分野の実験室から、魔法の実践に使う部屋、
事務的な補助を行う学生課まで、いろいろ入っているの。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALPHINAUD_000_052<tab>As the center of what would later become the Studium, it was established to promote the study of aetherological phenomena, hence the name.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALPHINAUD_000_052フェノメノンとは、「現象」を意味する言葉だからね。
最初に研究されたのは、エーテルによって生じる現象……
すなわち魔法だった。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALPHINAUD_000_053<tab>Though with aether being a fundamental aspect of nature, its scope expanded to include every conceivable facet of life and even the universe itself.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALPHINAUD_000_053以来、世界を織り成す多種多様な現象が、
ここで実践的に学ばれてきたんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALPHINAUD_000_054<tab>And then, in the four hundred and thirty-second year of the Sixth Astral Era, Phenomenon was decreed complete and the Studium officially opened as a place of learning.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALPHINAUD_000_054第六星暦432年、この講堂の完成とともに、
シャーレアン魔法大学は開校した。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALPHINAUD_000_055<tab>With a long and storied history, it is without question the world's leading authority in aetherology, the arcane, the occult, astromancy, and countless other fields, standing proud as─
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALPHINAUD_000_055今日に至るまで積み重ねられてきた現象の追及……
エーテル学、魔法学、神秘学、占星学などでの研究実績は、
この大学を名実ともに……

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIEANDKRILE_000_056<tab>(-Alisaie and Krile-)...Sharlayan's foremost educational institute!
target: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIEANDKRILE_000_056<tab>(-アリゼー＆クルル-)シャーレアンの最高学府たらしめている！

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_057<tab>You always did enjoy giving the grand tour to new students!
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_057ふふふ……言うと思った……。
アルフィノくん、新入生への案内とか得意だったものね……！

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_058<tab>Indeed, I've long since lost track of how many times he has recited that same foppish speech. Such is his undying love for his old stamping ground.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_058)) (( )) 02 /var>、いい？
ここはアルフィノ伝説の巣窟よ。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_059<tab>He was in top form back then. Youngest to enter the Studium, graduated with highest honors in magical arts and aetherology, undisputed champion of the debating chamber...
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_059史上最年少の11歳で入学を果たし、
魔法学やエーテル学で博士号を取得して華々しく卒業するまで、
成績はもちろん、学内での討論でも負けなしの男……！

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_060<tab>Hold on. You both joined the Studium at the same age, yes? And from where I stand, you're equally prodigious scholars.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_060あら、11歳で入学はアリゼーも同じでしょう？
私から見たら、ふたりとも信じられないくらい優秀だわ。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_061<tab>Nice of you to say, but Alphinaud actually entered half a year before me. Nor did I do well enough to graduate with honors. And I am certainly not the Studium's most notorious master debater.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_061同じ11歳でも、アルフィノより半年遅れてたもの。
博士号もとらなかったし、
討論も好きじゃなかったから参加しなかった。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_062<tab>In all respects have I ever been in his shadow. If nothing else, just remember that this was where the legend of Alphinaud Leveilleur began.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_062まあ、何でもいいわよ私のことは。
大事なのは、アルフィノがここで一目置かれてるってこと。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_063<tab>We should expect everyone to be fully aware of our recent escapades. Hopefully, we'll be somewhat more welcome here than we were at the Last Stand.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_063私たちの噂は、魔法大学にだって届いてるでしょうけど、
ラストスタンドで聞き込みをしたときみたいに、
邪険に扱われることはないと思うわ。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_064<tab>I know better than anyone the adoration the student body has for Alphinaud, and with a bit of luck, it might work to our advantage.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_064……その人気ぶりを、いちばん近くで、
嫌ってほど見てきた私が言うんだから、間違いないわよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_065<tab>Well, there's no time like the present.
target: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_065<tab>それじゃあ、中に入りましょうか。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_066<tab>First things first, let's look for Scholarch Montichaigne. Other faculty tend to frequent their offices, but unfortunately for us, he's fond of wandering wheresoever his whims take him...
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_066モンティシェーニュ様は、
大講堂の一角にある学長室でお仕事をなさっているけれど、
それ以外のときは各教室を見回ってらっしゃるの。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_067<tab>Let's split up and ask the students if they've seen him!
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_067きっと今日も、大講堂内のどこかでお会いできるはず。
手分けして、学生たちに居場所を聞いてみましょう！

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALPHINAUD_000_070<tab>I assure you, I'll tell you all about it <var 1A 02 /var>after<var 1A 01 /var> my business with the scholarch has concluded!
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALPHINAUD_000_070君たち、やめてくれたまえ……！
今日はただ、学長にお話があってだね……。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_STUDENTA04380_000_071<tab>(-Overzealous Student-)The scholarch!? Tell me, my good fellow, does this have something to do with saving the world from catastrophe?
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_STUDENTA04380_000_071(-意気込む魔法大学生-)学長に！？
それはやはり、世界の救済に関わる、
重大な案件なのでしょうか！？

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_STUDENTB04380_000_072<tab>(-Solemn Student-)Might we turn our attention to Master Leveilleur's graduation thesis? I, too, have my doubts regarding our policy of nonintervention...
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_STUDENTB04380_000_072(-真剣な魔法大学生-)先輩の論文、何度も読み直してます。
我が国の姿勢には、自分も疑問を感じていて……。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_STUDENTC04380_000_073<tab>(-Bright-eyed Student-)Is it true that your experiences overseas are the reason you have incurred the ire of the Forum? Oh, what I wouldn't give to see you butt heads with those old codgers!
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_STUDENTC04380_000_073(-目を輝かせる魔法大学生-)聞いたところによると、先輩は国外で見識を広げたのち、
先日ついに議員たちと舌戦を交わしたとか！
くううっ、さすが魔法大学最強の討論王ですッ！

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_075<tab>Things were bad enough during our school days, and Alphinaud's time abroad has only heightened his fame. Or should that be infamy?
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_075見てごらんなさい、あれがアルフィノの日常だったのよ。
……私の言ったとおりでしょ？

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_076<tab>He had his rivals and detractors, of course. Though most of them gave that up after his adoring fans set upon them like ravenous dogs.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_076もちろん、在学中には、
ライバル視する人だって少なくなかったわ。
けど、みんなすぐに挫かれていった……。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_077<tab>Alphinaud, on the other hand, never paid them much notice. They were simply beneath him...
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_ALISAIE_000_077しかも、アルフィノ当人には、
張り合ってたって認識すらないのよ。
相手は哀れとしか言いようがなかったわ……。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_080<tab>Unsurprisingly, the scholarch is not in his office. I did, however, speak with one student who saw him not long ago, so he can't have gone far.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_KRILE_000_080この教室には、いらっしゃらなかったわ。
「さっきすれ違いざまに挨拶をした」って子がいたから、
近くにいるんじゃないかと思うんだけれど……。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_STUDENTD04380_000_090<tab>Th-That was Alphinaud Leveilleur, wasn't it? <var 1A 02 /var>The<var 1A 01 /var> Alphinaud Leveilleur!
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_STUDENTD04380_000_090お、おい、今ここを通ったのって、
アルフィノ先輩だったよな！？

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_STUDENTD04380_000_091<tab>And he's with his sister and Master Baldesion's granddaughter! This can only mean one thing─an event of epoch-shattering proportions is fast approaching! Spread the word!
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_STUDENTD04380_000_091しかも、妹君と、ガラフ様の後継者まで連れて……
こりゃあ絶対に大事件だぞ。
早くみんなに言わなくちゃ……！

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_STUDENTD04380_000_092<tab>Oh, sorry, you said you're looking for the scholarch, yes? Knowing him, he could be anywhere, but Miss Aliapoh should have a better idea.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_STUDENTD04380_000_092……うん？　学長を見かけなかったかって？
いや、俺は見てないな。
の「キィ・アリアポー」さんに聞いてみたらどうだ？

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_STUDENTD04380_000_100<tab>What could warrant the sudden return of so many esteemed alumni? Is there truth to the rumors...? I must get to the bottom of this!
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_STUDENTD04380_000_100あんな大物卒業生たちが、連れ立って帰ってきたんだ。
絶対に、ただごとじゃないよな……！

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_110<tab>Are you lost? Wander in off the street, perhaps?
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_110おや、アナタは……
魔法大学の学生ではありませんね。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_111<tab>Wait, don't tell me... You're a trainee gleaner fresh off the guildship! I'm right, aren't I?
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_111どことなく旅慣れた風ですし、ギルドシップから紹介を受けた、
新任のグリーナーとお見受けします。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_112<tab>Oh, how silly of me, an orientation is in order. Ahem! Allow me to bid you a warm welcome to Searchers' Meet!
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_112よくぞお越しくださいました！
ここはシャーレアン魔法大学の選者殿、
私は窓口を務める、キィ・アリアポーです。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_113<tab>Let me start with a question: what is the most important thing you'll find in the Studium?
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_113すでにご存知かもしれませんが、
この場所について、軽く説明させていただきますね。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_114<tab>That's right─books! And what's the second most important? Why, that's simple... Everything else!
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_114選者殿は、魔法大学の生徒や教員が、
研究に必要な資材をそろえるための場所です。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_115<tab>That's what we deal in here at Searchers' Meet. Whenever the students or tutors find themselves in need of equipment or materials, they come to us. If we don't have it in our stores, we send the gleaners off to find it.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_115私が必要なものを伺って、在庫があればお出ししますし、
なければグリーナーに調達を依頼します。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_116<tab>Honestly, you wouldn't believe some of the requests we get. Eye of paissa this, tongue of gigantoad that...it's enough to make your hair stand on end! Which is possibly what some of our students are trying to accomplish, this being a school of magic and all.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_116なにせ、ここは魔法大学ですから……
簡単には手に入らない品を求められることも多いんです。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_117<tab>As our newest gleaner, you'll have your work cut out for you, but I think you'll find it quite rewarding!
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_117ということで、アナタにも、
これからたくさん依頼をさせていただきますね。
どうぞよろしくお願いします！

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_Q1_000_118<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_Q1_000_118<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_A1_000_119<tab>The only thing I'm interested in <var 1A 02 /var>gleaning<var 1A 01 /var> is information on the scholarch's whereabouts.
target: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_A1_000_119<tab>学長を探してるだけなんだけど……

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_A1_000_120<tab>I've tracked down many miscellaneous knickknacks in my time, but I'm no gleaner...
target: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_A1_000_120<tab>仕事に興味はあるが、グリーナーじゃない

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_121<tab>I beg your pudding? You're not a gleaner? Then this...was all an elaborate ruse!? No, wait─come to think of it, you never actually claimed to be one in the first place. My mistake!
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_121モンティシェーニュ学長を？
では、グリーナーではない……！？

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_122<tab>So what you're telling me is...you're not a gleaner? Yes, that's exactly what you said, isn't it... And you're looking for a scholarch? I'm afraid we don't have any of those in stock, but I can─ Ohhh, you mean <var 1A 02 /var>him<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_122グリーナーではない？
モンティシェーニュ学長を探しているだけ……！？

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_123<tab>He <var 1A 02 /var>was<var 1A 01 /var> here, but...now he's not. I did speak with him shortly before you arrived, though. He said he was on his way to Makers' Meet.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_123こ、これは失礼いたしました！
ちょうど今日、学長にお会いしましたが、
「」の様子を見に行く予定だとおっしゃっていましたよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_124<tab>Go back the way you came in, and you'll see it on the opposite side of the entrance. It's a laboratory of sorts, home to many rare and expensive curios...not to mention alarmingly frequent accidents. If you lose your way, just follow the bloodcurdling screams.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_124エントランスを挟んで、選者殿の反対にある部屋です。
学生が自由に使うことのできる工房なのですが、
個人では買えないような機材もあるので、重宝されています。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_125<tab>Ha! In the time it's taken me to tell you all of this, the scholarch has probably already left! Best of luck finding him─ I've a feeling you'll need it!
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_125時間的に、もう立ち去ったあとかもしれませんが……
そこにいる学生に聞いていただければ、行き先もわかるかと！

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_130<tab>
target: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_QIHALIAPOH_000_130<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_STUDENTE04380_000_140<tab>Yes, the scholarch was here a short while ago. He offered me advice on my current research project.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_STUDENTE04380_000_140ああ、学長なら確かに、さっきまでここにいたよ。
僕の製作した魔具に、意見をくださったんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_STUDENTE04380_000_141<tab>Though we spoke at length, I don't recall him mentioning where he was planning to go next. When we parted ways, he went down the corridor. Perhaps to one of the auditoriums?
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_STUDENTE04380_000_141次にどこに向かうかは聞いていないけど、
廊下を奥の方に進んでいったから、
講堂のどれかにいるんじゃないかな？

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_STUDENTE04380_000_150<tab>It's strange seeing Makers' Meet so empty. People usually treat it like a common room...
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_STUDENTE04380_000_150今日は、たまたま工匠殿がすいていてラッキーだったよ。
ここに入り浸る学生は、少なくないからね。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_SYSTEM_000_160<tab>You have been granted the run of Phenomenon. If you are game, Qih Aliapoh would put your artisanry to good use.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB101_04380_SYSTEM_000_160フェノメノン大講堂を利用できるようになりました！
魔法大学の仕事に興味がある場合は、
選者殿にいる「キィ・アリアポー」を訪ねてみましょう。
